Lyric:
[00:13.280]I took my love, I took it down
[00:19.200]Climbed a mountain and I turned around
[00:21.390]
[00:23.820]I saw my reflection in the snow covered hills
[00:29.900]
[00:30.290]till the landslide brought me down
[00:34.100]
[00:35.720]Oh, mirror in the sky
[00:38.720]What is love
[00:40.530]
[00:41.650]Can the child within my heart rise above
[00:45.710]
[00:47.640]Can I sail thru the changing ocean tides
[00:51.620]
[00:53.620]Can I handle the seasons of my life
[00:59.440]
[01:11.740]Well, Ive been afraid of changing
[01:17.800]cause Ive built my life around you
[01:21.539]
[01:23.600]But time makes you bolder
[01:26.360]
[01:27.280]Children get older
[01:30.100]Im getting older too
[01:33.170]
[01:59.620]Well, Ive been afraid of changing
[02:04.700]cause Ive built my life around you
[02:09.100]
[02:11.470]But time makes you bolder

[02:18.339]Im getting older too
[02:21.339]
[02:23.480]Im getting older too
[02:27.829]
[02:29.459]Oh, take my love, take it down
[02:33.660]
[02:38.489]Climb a mountain and turn around
[02:39.799]
[02:41.730]And If you see my reflection in the snow covered hills
[02:47.970]Well the landslide will bring it down
[02:52.480]

[02:59.0]
